seed_pair: A shop where I can buy some postcards.
Una tienda donde puedo comprar algunas postales.
seeds.reasoning: FORWARD SWEEP: 'a shop'→'una tienda' (article+noun, FD✅), 'where I can buy'→'donde puedo comprar' (relative clause, FD✅), 'some postcards'→'algunas postales' (quantifier+noun, FD✅). BACKWARD SWEEP: All covered. OVERLAPS: Added 'puedo comprar' to show modal pattern. Heuristic 1: No standalone particles. Heuristic 2: 'puedo comprar' appears in 2 LEGOs for recombination.

seed_pair: My grandfather fought in Italy during the war.
Mi abuelo combatió en Italia durante la guerra.
seeds.reasoning: FORWARD SWEEP: 'my grandfather'→'mi abuelo' (possessive+noun, FD✅), 'fought'→'combatió' (preterite verb, FD✅), 'in Italy'→'en Italia' (preposition+place, FD✅), 'during the war'→'durante la guerra' (temporal phrase, FD✅). BACKWARD SWEEP: All covered, no new patterns needed. Heuristic 1: All particles wrapped in context. Heuristic 2: Clean tiling, no overlaps needed.

seed_pair: My room number.

seeds.reasoning: FORWARD SWEEP: 'room number'→'número de habitación' (compound noun with 'de' construction, FD✅), 'my room number'→'mi número de habitación' (full phrase, FD✅). BACKWARD SWEEP: Covered. OVERLAPS: Created overlap to show both bare compound and with possessive. Heuristic 1: No standalone 'de'. Heuristic 2: Two LEGOs show possessive pattern.

seed_pair: I told her my room number once but she forgot it.
Le dije mi número de habitación una vez pero ella lo olvidó.
seeds.reasoning: FORWARD SWEEP: 'I told her'→'le dije' (indirect object+verb, FD✅), 'my room number'→'mi número de habitación' (from S0463, FD✅), 'once'→'una vez' (article+noun for time, FD✅), 'but'→'pero' (conjunction, FD✅), 'she forgot it'→'ella lo olvidó' (subject+direct object pronoun+verb, FD✅). BACKWARD SWEEP: 'olvidó' alone❌ needs subject, 'lo olvidó'❌ needs subject, 'ella lo olvidó'✅ complete. Heuristic 1: No standalone pronouns. Heuristic 2: Clean tiling.

seed_pair: Next time I will ask her what her name is.

seeds.reasoning: FORWARD SWEEP: 'next time'→'la próxima vez' (time expression, FD✅), 'I will ask her'→'voy a preguntarle' (ir a future+indirect object, FD✅), 'what her name is'→'cuál es su nombre' (question construction, FD✅). Heuristic 2: 'su nombre' pattern useful for generation.

seed_pair: Let me throw it over the wall.

seeds.reasoning: FORWARD SWEEP: 'let me'→'déjame' (imperative+pronoun, FD✅), 'throw it'→'lanzarlo' (infinitive+pronoun, FD✅), 'over the wall'→'sobre el muro' (preposition+article+noun, FD✅). Heuristic 2: 'déjame lanzarlo' shows command+action pattern for recombination.

seed_pair: It's next to the car park.
Está al lado del estacionamiento.
seeds.reasoning: FORWARD SWEEP: 'it's'→'está' (location verb, FD✅), 'next to the car park'→'al lado del estacionamiento' (prepositional phrase with contraction 'del'=de+el, FD✅). BACKWARD SWEEP: 'estacionamiento' useful as standalone. OVERLAPS: Added 'estacionamiento' to show noun separately. Heuristic 1: Contraction 'del' kept in context. seed_pair: It's a big world.
Es un mundo grande.
seeds.reasoning: FORWARD SWEEP: 'it's'→'es' (copula, FD✅), 'a big world'→'un mundo grande' (article+noun+adjective showing adjective-after-noun order, FD✅). BACKWARD SWEEP: 'mundo grande'→'big world' useful to highlight adjective position. OVERLAPS: Added 'mundo grande' to emphasize word order pattern. Heuristic 1: No standalone articles. Heuristic 2: 'mundo grande' shows Spanish adjective placement.

seed_pair: But that doesn't mean we can't change it.
Pero eso no significa que no podamos cambiarlo.
seeds.reasoning: FORWARD SWEEP: 'but'→'pero' (conjunction, FD✅), 'that doesn't mean'→'eso no significa que' (includes subjunctive trigger 'que', FD✅), 'we can't change it'→'no podamos cambiarlo' (subjunctive clause, FD✅). BACKWARD SWEEP: 'cambiarlo'→'change it' useful overlap, 'podamos'❌ alone uncertain (indicative vs subjunctive), needs 'que' trigger. OVERLAPS: Added 'no significa que' and 'cambiarlo' for patterns. Heuristic 1: Subjunctive needs trigger 'que'. Heuristic 2: Multiple overlaps show 'significa que' + subjunctive pattern.

seed_pair: How high do you want to climb before we stop?
¿Qué tan alto quieres escalar antes de que paremos?
seeds.reasoning: FORWARD SWEEP: 'how high'→'qué tan alto' (question construction, FD✅), 'do you want to climb'→'quieres escalar' (verb+infinitive, FD✅), 'before we stop'→'antes de que paremos' (subjunctive trigger+clause, FD✅). BACKWARD SWEEP: 'paremos'❌ alone uncertain (paramos vs paremos), 'que paremos'❌ needs trigger, 'de que paremos'❌ needs trigger, 'antes de que paremos'✅ complete. OVERLAPS: Added 'escalar' as standalone vocabulary. Heuristic 1: Subjunctive 'paremos' needs full 'antes de que' trigger. Heuristic 2: Clean patterns.
